info.title: Billing benefits RP
info.description: Azure Benefits RP let users create and manage benefits like savings plan.

get.description: List discounts that are applicable for a given scope. Currently supported scopes: billing accounts

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the benefits are listed.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: May be used to filter by reservation properties. The filter supports 'eq', 'or', and 'and'. It does not currently support 'ne', 'gt', 'le', 'ge', or 'not'. Reservation properties include sku/name, properties/{appliedScopeType, archived, displayName, displayProvisioningState, effectiveDateTime, expiryDate, provisioningState, quantity, renew, reservedResourceType, term, userFriendlyAppliedScopeType, userFriendlyRenewState}

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: May be used to sort order by reservation properties.

parameters.name: refreshSummary
parameters.description: To indicate whether to refresh the roll up counts of the savings plans group by provisioning states

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: The number of savings plans to skip from the list before returning results

parameters.name: selectedState
parameters.description: The selected provisioning state

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: To number of savings plans to return

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The request body

post.description: Cancel discount. Stops applying the benefit.

parameters.name: discountName
parameters.description: Name of the discount

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

AppliedScopeProperties.description: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable.

tenantId.description: Tenant ID where the benefit is applied.

managementGroupId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the management group where the benefit must be applied.

resourceGroupId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the resource group.

ApplyDiscountOn.description: The customer action on which the discount is applied. Supported values are Purchase, Consume, and Renew. Validation: Required, one of supported values.

BillingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

BillingPlanInformation.description: Information describing the type of billing plan for this savings plan.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount of money to be paid for the Order. Tax is not included.

startDate.description: Date when the billing plan has started.

nextPaymentDueDate.description: For recurring billing plans, indicates the date when next payment will be processed. Null when total is paid off.

CustomPriceProperties.description: Custom price properties for a given discount.

ruleType.description: The type of the priceable node pricing rule. Validation: Required. Supported values are fixedPriceLock, fixedListPrice, and priceCeiling.

catalogId.description: The catalog instance where the priceable node lives. Validation: Required. No defined format, will vary per team.

catalogClaims.description: The set of BigCat claims. Validation: Required. Must contain AgreementType, NationalCloud, and PricingAudience claims. Additionally requires AccessPass claim when creating custom price with action == consume on the pricing instructions.

termUnits.description: The term units for the priceable node. Validation: Optional, Maximum length 128 characters. Must be present if and only if the availability derived by market, product, sku, and claims has terms.

billingPeriod.description: The billing period of the priceable node. Validation: Optional, Maximum length 128 characters. Only allowed if the availability derived by market, product, sku, and claims has terms and at least one of those terms has a billing period. When specified, termUnits must be specified.

meterType.description: Must be present if the market, product, sku, and claims, and optional term information resolves to multiple availabilities that only differ by meter type. Validation: Maximum length 128 characters.

marketSetPrices.description: The set of market set prices of the priceable node. Validation: Required. Must contain at least one element.

managedBy.description: The fully qualified resource ID of the resource that manages this resource. Indicates if this resource is managed by another Azure resource. If this is present, complete mode deployment will not delete the resource if it is removed from the template since it is managed by another resource.

kind.description: Metadata used by portal/tooling/etc to render different UX experiences for resources of the same type. E.g. ApiApps are a kind of Microsoft.Web/sites type.  If supported, the resource provider must validate and persist this value.

etag.description: The etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal etag convention.  Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. HTTP/1.1 uses entity tags in the etag (section 14.19), If-Match (section 14.24), If-None-Match (section 14.26), and If-Range (section 14.27) header fields.

identity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

DiscountAppliedScopeType.description: List of applied scopes supported for discounts.

DiscountCombinationRule.description: The discount combination rule when there are multiple applicable custom prices. Validation: Required. Supported values are Stackable and BestOf.

DiscountEntityType.description: This defines whether the entity being created is primary or affiliate. Supported values: primary, affiliate. Validation: Required, must match one of the 2 values.

value.description: The Discount items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

entityType.description: This defines whether the entity being created is primary or affiliate. Supported values: primary, affiliate. Validation: Required, must match one of the 2 values.

productCode.description: This is the catalog UPN for the product.

startAt.description: Start date of the discount. Value is the date the discount started or will start in the future.

systemId.description: This is the globally unique identifier of the Discount which will not change for the lifetime of the Discount.

provisioningState.description: The state of the resource. Supported values are Pending, Failed, Succeeded, Canceled.

billingAccountResourceId.description: Billing account resource id where the discount metadata is present.

billingProfileResourceId.description: Billing profile resource id where the discount is scoped to.

customerResourceId.description: Customer resource id where the discount is scoped to.

displayName.description: This defines a user friendly display name for the discount.

status.description: Represents the current status of the discount.

benefitResourceId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the benefit under applicable benefit list.

appliedScopeType.description: List of applied scopes supported for discounts.

DiscountRuleType.description: The type of the priceable node pricing rule. Validation: Required. Supported values are fixedPriceLock, fixedListPrice, and priceCeiling.

DiscountStatus.description: Represents the current status of the discount.

DiscountType.description: Defines the type of discount. Supported values are ProductFamily, Product, Sku, CustomPrice, and CustomPriceMultiCurrency.

DiscountTypeCustomPrice.description: Discount type properties including product family name, product id, sku, and custom price properties. Allows a single entry in marketSetPrices.

productFamilyName.description: Product family for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional

productId.description: Product ID for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional. No specific format, example: DZH318Z09V6F

skuId.description: ResourceSku for the given discount. Validation: Optional.

customPriceProperties.description: Custom price properties for a given discount.

DiscountTypeCustomPriceMultiCurrency.description: Discount type properties including product family name, product id, sku, and custom price properties. Allows multiple entries in marketSetPrices.

DiscountTypeProduct.description: Discount type properties including product family name and product id.

productFamilyName.description: Product family for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional

productId.description: Product ID for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional. No specific format, example: DZH318Z09V6F

DiscountTypeProductFamily.description: Discount type properties including product family name

productFamilyName.description: Product family for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional

DiscountTypeProductSku.description: Discount type properties including product family name, product id, and sku id.

productFamilyName.description: Product family for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional

productId.description: Product ID for which the discount is given. Validation: Optional. No specific format, example: DZH318Z09V6F

skuId.description: ResourceSku for the given discount. Validation: Optional.

DiscountTypeProperties.description: This defines the conditions for a given discount type.

discountType.description: Defines the type of discount. Supported values are ProductFamily, Product, Sku, CustomPrice, and CustomPriceMultiCurrency.

applyDiscountOn.description: The customer action on which the discount is applied. Supported values are Purchase, Consume, and Renew. Validation: Required, one of supported values.

discountPercentage.description: Discount percentage provided for the customer. Validation: Required unless this is a price rule.

discountCombinationRule.description: The discount combination rule when there are multiple applicable custom prices. Validation: Required. Supported values are Stackable and BestOf.

priceGuaranteeProperties.description: Set only in price guarantee scenario.

conditions.description: Array of conditions for the discount. Validation: Optional. Maximum length is 1000.

primaryResourceId.description: This will be present in the response if the primary has a resource ID

endAt.description: End date of the discount. No duration will be supported. Allowed value is any date greater than or equal to startDate.

discountTypeProperties.description: This defines the conditions for a given discount type.

endAt.description: End date of the discount. No duration will be supported. Allowed value is any date greater than or equal to startDate.

message.description: The message giving detailed information about the status code.

InstanceFlexibility.description: Turning this on will apply the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group.

ManagedServiceIdentity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

principalId.description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

type.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

userAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

ManagedServiceIdentityType.description: Type of managed service identity (where both SystemAssigned and UserAssigned types are allowed).

value.description: The locked price for the priceable node. Validation: Required. Must be greater than or equal to 0. If the case of billing plans. This represents the price for each cycle charge.

currency.description: The currency of the locked price value. Validation: Required. Must be a valid ISO 4217 3-letter currency code.

PaymentDetail.description: Information about payment related to a savings plan order.

dueDate.description: Date when the payment needs to be done.

paymentDate.description: Date when the transaction is completed. Is null when it is scheduled.

pricingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount in pricing currency. Tax not included.

billingCurrencyTotal.description: Amount charged in Billing currency. Tax not included. Is null for future payments

status.description: Describes whether the payment is completed, failed, cancelled or scheduled in the future.

PaymentStatus.description: Describes whether the payment is completed, failed, cancelled or scheduled in the future.

name.description: A user defined name of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being procured.

publisher.description: The publisher of the 3rd Party Artifact that is being bought. E.g. NewRelic

product.description: The 3rd Party artifact that is being procured. E.g. NewRelic. Product maps to the OfferID specified for the artifact at the time of Data Market onboarding.

promotionCode.description: A publisher provided promotion code as provisioned in Data Market for the said product/artifact.

version.description: The version of the desired product/artifact.

currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 3-letter currency code for the currency used by this purchase record.

PriceGuaranteeProperties.description: Set only in price guarantee scenario.

priceGuaranteeDate.description: The date on which prices are to be used for guarantee calculation. Validation: expected to be 00 hours, Format: 2024-09-30T00:00:00Z. Must be in UTC.

PricingCurrencyDuration.description: Represents either billing plan or savings plan term in ISO 8601 format.

duration.description: Represents either billing plan or savings plan term in ISO 8601 format.

sku.description: The SKU to be applied for this resource

displayName.description: Friendly name of the savings plan

billingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing the benefit

term.description: Represent benefit term in ISO 8601 format.

billingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

effectiveDateTime.description: DateTime of the savings plan starts providing benefit from.

renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new benefit on the expiration date time.

appliedScopeProperties.description: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable.

location.description: The Azure Region where the reservation benefits are applied to.

billingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing the benefit

billingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

quantity.description: Total Quantity of the SKUs purchased in the Reservation.

renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new benefit on the expiration date time.

reservedResourceType.description: The type of the resource that is being reserved.

reviewDateTime.description: This is the date-time when the Azure Hybrid Benefit needs to be reviewed.

reservedResourceProperties.description: Properties specific to each reserved resource type. Not required if not applicable.

instanceFlexibility.description: Turning this on will apply the reservation discount to other VMs in the same VM size group.

scope.description: Scope of the role assignment entity

value.description: The SavingsPlanModel items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

SavingsPlanModelListResult.description: Represents the result of listing savings plan models

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page.

additionalProperties.description: The roll out count summary of the savings plans

displayProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the savings plan for display, e.g. Succeeded

billingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing the benefit

billingProfileId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the billing profile where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Field-led or Customer-led customers.

customerId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the customer where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Partner-led customers.

billingAccountId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the billing account where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Enterprise Agreement customers.

term.description: Represent benefit term in ISO 8601 format.

billingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

userFriendlyAppliedScopeType.description: The applied scope type of the savings plan for display, e.g. Shared

appliedScopeProperties.description: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable.

effectiveDateTime.description: DateTime of the savings plan starts providing benefit from.

purchaseDateTime.description: Date time when the savings plan was purchased

benefitStartTime.description: This is the DateTime when the savings plan benefit started.

renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new benefit on the expiration date time.

renewSource.description: SavingsPlan Id of the SavingsPlan from which this SavingsPlan is renewed.

renewDestination.description: SavingsPlan Id of the SavingsPlan which is purchased because of renew.

savingsPlanOrderId.description: Identifier of the savings plan created

billingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing the benefit

billingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

value.description: The SavingsPlanOrderModel items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

billingScopeId.description: Subscription that will be charged for purchasing the benefit

billingProfileId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the billing profile where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Field-led or Customer-led customers.

customerId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the customer where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Partner-led customers.

billingAccountId.description: Fully-qualified identifier of the billing account where the savings plan is applied. Present only for Enterprise Agreement customers.

term.description: Represent benefit term in ISO 8601 format.

billingPlan.description: Represents the billing plan in ISO 8601 format. Required only for monthly billing plans.

benefitStartTime.description: This is the DateTime when the savings plan benefit started.

planInformation.description: Information describing the type of billing plan for this savings plan.

value.description: The roll up count summary of savings plans in each state

SavingsPlanSummaryCount.description: The roll up count summary of savings plans in each state

succeededCount.description: The number of savings plans in Succeeded state

failedCount.description: The number of savings plans in Failed state

expiringCount.description: The number of savings plans in Expiring state

expiredCount.description: The number of savings plans in Expired state

pendingCount.description: The number of savings plans in Pending state

cancelledCount.description: The number of savings plans in Cancelled state

processingCount.description: The number of savings plans in Processing state

noBenefitCount.description: The number of savings plans in No Benefit state

warningCount.description: The number of savings plans in Warning state

appliedScopeProperties.description: Properties specific to applied scope type. Not required if not applicable.

renew.description: Setting this to true will automatically purchase a new benefit on the expiration date time.

valid.description: Indicates if the provided input was valid

reasonCode.description: Failure reason code if the provided input was invalid

reason.description: Failure reason if the provided input was invalid

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page.

Sku.description: The resource model definition representing SKU

name.description: The name of the SKU. E.g. P3. It is typically a letter+number code

tier.description: This field is required to be implemented by the Resource Provider if the service has more than one tier, but is not required on a PUT.

size.description: The SKU size. When the name field is the combination of tier and some other value, this would be the standalone code.

family.description: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be captured here.

capacity.description: If the SKU supports scale out/in then the capacity integer should be included. If scale out/in is not possible for the resource this may be omitted.

Term.description: Represent benefit term in ISO 8601 format.

trend.description: The number of days trend for a savings plan

aggregates.description: The array of aggregates of a savings plan's utilization

UtilizationAggregates.description: The aggregate values of savings plan utilization

grainUnit.description: The grain unit of the aggregate
